Class Encoder

java.lang.Object
  Encoder

public class Encoder
extends java.lang.Object

Object capable of encoding and decoding data.

Author:
Jose Lopes

existsExactlyOneNeighbour

private Block existsExactlyOneNeighbour(java.util.List<Block> list)
Checks the elements of a given list, if there is one with a single connection to the source packets.

Parameters:
list - List of Blocks.
Returns:
The first Block found, with only one connection to the source packets. null if no Block met the condition.
